Package edu.bu.pas.pacman.agents

Class SearchAgent

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.pacman.agents.Agent
edu.bu.pas.pacman.agents.SearchAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
GhostAgent
public abstract class SearchAgent extends Agent
A class representing an Agent that uses a graph traversal algorithm for route planning between Coordinates on the map.
See Also:
  • Coordinate
  • Path
  • Game.GameView

  • Constructor Details

    • SearchAgent

      public SearchAgent(int myUnitId, int pacmanId, int ghostChaseRadius)
      A constructor to create an intance of this agent.
      Parameters:
      myUnitId - The id of the unit this Agent is controlling in the game.
      pacmanId - The id of the pacman in the game.
      ghostChaseRadius - How far away (measured via Chebyshev distance) ghosts will start to chase pacman in the game.

  • Method Details

    • getTargetCoordinate

      public final Coordinate getTargetCoordinate()
      A getter method to get the Coordinate of where this agent is currently trying to send the entity it controls. If this is null then this agent is not trying to send it's unit anywhere.
      Returns:
      The Coordinate of where this agent wants to naviagte it's unit to in the map.

    • getPlanToGetToTarget

      public final Stack<Coordinate> getPlanToGetToTarget()
      A getter method to get the Stack of Coordinate that, if followed, will get the unit this agent agent controls to the target Coordinate. If this is null and this.getTargetCoordinate() is not, then the plan has yet to be made. If they are both null then this agent is not trying to send its unit anywhere.
      Returns:
      The Stack of Coordinate objects that, if followed, will lead this agent's unit to the target location.

    • setTargetCoordinate

      public void setTargetCoordinate(Coordinate c)
      A setter method to set the target Coordinate for this agent's unit.
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate this agent wants to send the unit it controls.

    • setPlanToGetToTarget

      public void setPlanToGetToTarget(Stack<Coordinate> s)
      A setter method to set the plan to get this agent's unit to the target.
      Parameters:
      s - The Stack of Coordinate objects that, if followed, will lead this agent's unit to the target.

    • getOutgoingNeighbors

      public abstract Set<Coordinate> getOutgoingNeighbors(Coordinate src, Game.GameView game)
      A method to calculate the outgoing neighbors of a provided Coordinate.
      Parameters:
      src - A source Coordinate who we want to get the outgoing neighborhood of.
      game - A Game.GameView object representing the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      All Coordinates who are outgoing neighbors of the source.

    • graphSearch

      public abstract Path<Coordinate> graphSearch(Coordinate src, Coordinate tgt, Game.GameView game)
      A method to calculate the shortest path from the input source Coordinate to the destination Coordinate with a frozen Game.GameView. Remember that this is a static world, so the world will not change while an agent is thinking (e.g. executing the makeMove method). So, this method calculates a shortest path where all of the units on the board are frozen.
      Parameters:
      src - The source Coordinate to find the shortest path from.
      tgt - The destination Coordinate to find the shortest path to.
      game - A Game.GameView object representing the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The shortest path of Coordinate that, if followed, will get the unit this agent controls from the source to the destination.

    • makePlan

      public abstract void makePlan(Game.GameView game)
      A method to calculate the plan that this agent's unit should follow to get from its current location to the target location. This plan should be calculated using a single-source shortest path algorithm (e.g. using the graphSearch method). The shortest path should be converted into a Stack object and used to set the planToGetToTarget field (e.g. call setPlanToGetToTarget).
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game.

    • resetOnPacmansNextLife

      public void resetOnPacmansNextLife(Game.GameView game)
      A method used to forget the target and current plan. This method is called when pacman has been caught by a ghost, lost a life, and all entities have been reset.
      Specified by:
      resetOnPacmansNextLife in class Agent
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game. Pacman and all ghosts have had their locations and state reset.
